In actual prices in £s and including VAT. Provided by BEIS/DEFRA in the official report on GHG Emissions of the UK between 1996-2018. Where source emission factors are identical across a variety of activities they have been grouped to avoid confusion - details are documented in the OEFDB data guidance.

results.name: Grid mix
results.description: Emission intensity of local power grid (low voltage) for households/small consumption incl. grid losses (according to statistical data). Total life cycle incl. transport + material input without disposal. Retrieved from GEMIS v5.0.

results.name: Grid mix (excluding T&D)
results.description: Emission intensity of power plant mix (according to statistical data). Excluding electricity transport/distribution and substation losses. Total life cycle incl. transport + material input without disposal. Retrieved from GEMIS v5.0.

results.name: Grid mix
results.description: Emission intensity of grid mix as reported. The value includes emissions associated with upstream (combustibles) combustion at plant and transport and delivery (losses). Retrieved from Base Carbone - Data V21.0.csv.

results.name: Motor vessel 110m
results.description: Emission intensity for motor vessel (110 meters). Western Europe route. Published by STC-NESTRA B.V in 2018.

results.name: Container vessels 110m
results.description: Emission intensity for a container vessels. Amsterdam-Rotterdam-Antwerp route. Published by STC-NESTRA B.V in 2018.

results.name: Container vessels 135m
results.description: Emission intensity for a container vessels. Rhine–Main–Danube Canal route. Published by STC-NESTRA B.V in 2018.

results.name: Coupled convoy 163 - 185m
results.description: Emission intensity for a coupled convoy (between 163 and 185 meters). The indicated value corresponds to the Amsterdam-Rotterdam-Antwerp and Rhine routes interchangeably. Published by STC-NESTRA B.V in 2018.

results.name: Motor vessel 85 - 86m
results.description: Emission intensity for motor vessel (between 85 and 86 meters). Western Europe route. Published by STC-NESTRA B.V in 2018.

results.name: Motor vessel 87 - 109m
results.description: Emission intensity for motor vessel (between 87 and 109 meters). Western Europe route. Published by STC-NESTRA B.V in 2018.

results.name: Motor vessel 135m
results.description: Emission intensity for motor vessel (135 meters). The indicated value corresponds to the Western Europe Amsterdam-Rotterdam-Antwerp and Rhine routes interchangeably. Published by STC-NESTRA B.V in 2018.

results.name: Motor vessel ≤ 80m
results.description: Emission intensity for motor vessel (Less than or equal to 80 meters). Western Europe route. Published by STC-NESTRA B.V in 2018.

results.name: Container vessels coupled convoy
results.description: Emission intensity for a container vessel coupled convoy. Rhine route. Published by STC-NESTRA B.V in 2018.

results.name: Pushed convoy push boat with 2 barges
results.description: Emission intensity for pushed convoy push boat with 2 barges. Rhine–Main–Danube canal route. Published by STC-NESTRA B.V in 2018.

results.name: Pushed convoy push boat with 4 or 5 barges
results.description: Emission intensity for pushed convoy push boat with 4 or 5 barges. Rhine–Main–Danube canal route. Published by STC-NESTRA B.V in 2018.

results.name: Pushed convoy push boat with 6 barges
results.description: Emission intensity for pushed convoy push boat with 6 barges. Rhine–Main–Danube canal route. Published by STC-NESTRA B.V in 2018.

results.name: Tanker vessel 135m
results.description: Emission intensity for tanker vessel (135 meters). Amsterdam-Rotterdam-Antwerp route. Published by STC-NESTRA B.V in 2018.

results.name: Tanker vessel 110m
results.description: Emission intensity for tanker vessel (less than 110 meters). Western Europe route. Published by STC-NESTRA B.V in 2018.
